price: 167 Ceux qui rejettent la foi et détournent les hommes de la voie d’Allah se sont gravement écartés de la vérité.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ قَدۡ ضَلُّواْ ضَلَٰلَۢا بَعِيدًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi qad ḍallū ḍalālan baʿīdan
